org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd

extends Object
implements PhdWriter

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhdBallWriter

        public PhdBallWriter(OutputStream out)
              throws IOException
        Create a new PhdBallWriter instance that will write its contents to the given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to write to; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.
        IOException - if there are problems creating the writer.

      • PhdBallWriter

        public PhdBallWriter(OutputStream out,
                     String fileComment)
              throws IOException
        Create a new PhdBallWriter instance that will write its contents to the given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to write to; can not be null.
        fileComment - a comment String to be written at the top of the phdball; Should only be one line. The writer will format the comment so phd's know that it is a comment. If fileComment is null, then no comment will be written.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if fileComment is more than one line.
        IOException - if there are problems writing the fileComment to the outputStream.

      • PhdBallWriter

        public PhdBallWriter(File outputFile,
                     String fileComment)
              throws IOException
        Create a new PhdBallWriter instance that will write its contents to the given file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the File to write to; can not be null. If this file already exists, then it will be overwritten. If the File does not exist it will be created along with any non-existent parent directories.
        fileComment - a comment String to be written at the top of the phdball; Should only be one line. The writer will format the comment so phd's know that it is a comment. If fileComment is null, then no comment will be written.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem creating the file or writing the fileComment (if non-null).
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if fileComment is more than one line.

      • PhdBallWriter

        public PhdBallWriter(File outputFile)
              throws IOException
        Create a new PhdBallWriter instance that will write its contents to the given file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the File to write to; can not be null. If this file already exists, then it will be overwritten. If the File does not exist it will be created along with any non-existent parent directories.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem creating the file.
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        public void write(Phd phd)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: PhdWriter
        Write the given Phd without version information. This is the same as write(phd, null) All PhdWholeReadItems, comments and PhdReadTags for this Phd will also be written out. If the Phd does not contain any positions (Phd.getPeakSequence() returns null) then positions will not be written out.
        Specified by:
        write in interface PhdWriter
        Parameters:
        phd - the phd to write, can not be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem writing this phd.
        See Also:
        PhdWriter.write(Phd, Integer)

      • write

        public void write(Phd phd,
                  Integer version)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: PhdWriter
        Write the given Phd with the given version number. New versions of consed support the version number included along with the sequence name inside the phd file. Previously the version information was only available by the number suffix in the filename. All PhdWholeReadItems, comments and PhdReadTags for this Phd will also be written out. If the Phd does not contain any positions (Phd.getPeakSequence() returns null) then positions will not be written out.
        Specified by:
        write in interface PhdWriter
        Parameters:
        phd - the phd to write, can not be null.
        version - the version of this phd; if this value is null, then no version is written.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem writing this phd.
